extracted_playbook.title: Update to FOXMAN-UN R16B PC3 or later
extracted_playbook.description: Update the system to FOXMAN-UN R16B PC3 or later and apply general mitigation factors.

extracted_playbook.title: Update to FOXMAN-UN R15B PC5
extracted_playbook.description: Update the system to FOXMAN-UN R15B PC5 and apply general mitigation factors.

extracted_playbook.title: Update to FOXMAN-UN R16B PC4 or R15B PC5
extracted_playbook.description: Update the system to FOXMAN-UN R16B PC4 or R15B PC5 and apply general mitigation factors.

extracted_playbook.title: Update to FOX61x R16B
extracted_playbook.description: Update the system to FOX61x R16B.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the Internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Locate Control System Networks Behind Firewalls
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use more secure methods, such as Virtual Private Networks (VPNs). Ensure VPNs are updated to the most recent version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, as detailed in CISA's guidance.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures and report findings to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Clicking Unsolicited Links or Attachments
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages.

extracted_playbook.title: Educate on Social Engineering and Phishing Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Refer to CISA's resources on recognizing and avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.
